experience_assessment: I have published in this field for several years.
review_assessment:_checking_correctness_: I assessed the sensibility of the experiments.
review_assessment:_thoroughness_in_paper: I made a quick assessment of this paper.
title: Official Blind Review #3
review:
While this paper tackles an interesting problem. The technical approach is unfortunately too outdated and obvious and not quite the level of ICLR. 
The dataset is likely too easy given the high accuracy.
